casebody.data:
Long
v.
Currituck County, et al. 274P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 28, 2016 George B. Currin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Long, Michael P., et al. Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, for Currituck County. Gregory E. Wills, Attorney at Law, Point Harbor, for Letendre, Elizabeth.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of July 2016 by Respondent (Elizabeth Letendre) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of July 2016."
